articles.title: Medvedev Beats Zverev To Reach Rome QFs - ATP Tour
articles.description: Without a win at the Internazionali BNL d'Italia prior to this year, Daniil Medvedev on Tuesday notched his third win of the 2023 edition of the ATP Masters 1000 by defeating Alexander Zverev to reach the quarter-finals.
articles.content:
Have the match-winning floodgates opened for Daniil Medvedev in Rome?
